The needle is positioned in-plane in the lateral to medial direction between the transversus abdominis muscle and the internal oblique abdominis muscle (arrows). The bony shadows in the right lower corner is the anterior superior iliac spine. Arrows: target plane of local anesthetic deposit, EO: external oblique, IO: internal oblique, TA: transversus abdominis muscle.
